name: Hentai Story
description:
Hentai story is a puzzle game designed for a pleasant pastime. The goal of the game is to rearrange the tiles to get the final picture. The whole gameplay is accompanied by pleasant and relaxing music.

Key feature:
- Can undress
- Passage
- Arts
- Deception mode (F)
- Many achievements
- Pleasant music

All characters over 21 years.
